version.name: Hypermatix64
version.repos:
Please note that Hypermatix64 may add repositories to your system. Without the use of these repositories, many applications will be unavailable to you. The repositories will be automatically removed if you uninstall all the programs which need them.


It is highly unlikely that these repositories will affect your computer in any negative way, and any exceptions will be listed in the descriptions for the options in question.
version.about: Hypermatix64 is developed and maintained by RogueAI (Declan Hoare). It is based on Ultamatix by TheeMahn, which is in turn based on Automatix2 by the Automatix Team. The Web page of Hypermatix64 can be found at http://home.exetel.com.au/declanhoare/hypermatix64. The GitHub repository is located at https://www.github.com/RogueAI42/hypermatix64. If you have suggestions or requests, please send them to declanhoare@exemail.com.au. Thanks to everyone else who has indirectly contributed to Hypermatix64 or its predecessors.
